@description.name: @description
@description.body: Abstract base class for GUI applications using qooxdoo widgets.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Create the root widget. This method is abstract and must be overridden by sub classes.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.ui.core.Widget} The root widget. This widget must be configured
     with a {@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} or {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas} layout.
@return.description:
The root widget. This widget must be configured
     with a {@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} or {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas} layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the application's root widget. The root widgets can act as container for popups. It is configured with a {@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} (if the application is an inline application) layout or a {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas} (if the application is a standalone application) layout . The root has the same add method as the configured layout ({@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} or {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas}).

@description.body: interface method

@description.body: interface method

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the GUI rendering

@description.name: @description
@description.body: interface method

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message with translation hint Mark the messages for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message with translation hint Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Mark the message for translation but return the original message.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxObjectId. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
